welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Pine Lake Park, known for its beautiful parks, quaint shops, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover the hidden gems of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robert J. Miller Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robert J. Miller Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
